subject: Notification of Margin Call
content:
Hi team,

 

Please find attached our margin return request.

 

Regards

Xxxxx Xxxxxx
Middle Office

Client OPQ

attachments.textcontent:
Notification of Margin Call 
Date, 18/09/2018 
To: CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKET LTD 
 
From: Client OPQ 
 
Pursuant to the agreement between CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKET LTD and Client OPQ we hereby give notice 
of the following Collateral Movement as of Close of Business 17/09/2018 
 
 
Net Margin Details 
. 
Exposure EUR -6,860,673.34  
Indipendent Amount(s) EUR  -    
Credit Support Amount EUR -6,860,673.34  
After Haircut Value of Collateral Held/(Pledged) EUR -7,116,000.00  
Margin Call EUR  255,326.66  
   
Minimum Transfer Amount EUR  250,000.00  
Return Rounding Amount EUR  10,000.00  
   
Market Value of Margin Collateral required by Client OPQ EUR 250,000.00   
persuant this notice   
 
 
Pursuant the ISDA Agreement between CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKET LTD and Client OPQ CITIGROUP 
GLOBAL MARKET LTD is appointed as Calculation Agent. Please check valuations and advise if different 
 
 
Please contact our office to confirm your agreement to the amount of the Collateral Movement and advise 
settlement 
 
 
Thanks in advance for your cooperation and regards. 
Client OPQ
